title: Archive a Regulatory Submission
description: After a submission has been approved by a health authority, the regulatory operations specialist must formally archive the complete submission package.

tasks.description: Identify the complete submission package, including all correspondence with the health authority.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers the original submission, all amendments, and all approval letters.

tasks.description: Transfer the complete package to the long-term electronic archive.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully moves the files to the archival system.

tasks.description: Apply the correct metadata and retention policy to the archived record.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent tags the record with the product name, approval date, and sets the retention period as required by regulations.
